PI: I loved <@U01ATRLRD8V>, but I think its biggest limitation was that it was entirely slack-based (submit via dm, posts to a channel) which made posts inherently short and sparse. What if......like a substack thingy but for hack clubbers. In the same way you join neighborhood channels, you can subscribe to neighborhood newsletters/blogs/journals/spaces/whatever
